com.google.gwt.i18n.rebind
Class MessageFormatParser

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.i18n.rebind.MessageFormatParser
Deprecated. use MessageFormatUtils instead 

@Deprecated
public class MessageFormatParser
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class for parsing MessageFormat-style format strings.

Nested Class Summary
static class MessageFormatParser.ArgumentChunk
          Deprecated. Represents an argument in a template string.
static class MessageFormatParser.DefaultTemplateChunkVisitor
          Deprecated. Default implementation of TemplateChunkVisitor -- other implementations should extend this if possible to avoid breakage when new TemplateChunk subtypes are added.
static class MessageFormatParser.StaticArgChunk
          Deprecated. Represents a static argument, which is used to remove markup from translator view without having to supply it at each callsite.
static class MessageFormatParser.StringChunk
          Deprecated. Represents a literal string portion of a template string.
static class MessageFormatParser.TemplateChunk
          Deprecated. Represents a parsed chunk of a template.
static interface MessageFormatParser.TemplateChunkVisitor
          Deprecated. Visitor for template chunks.

Method Detail

assemble

public static java.lang.String assemble(java.lang.Iterable<MessageFormatParser.TemplateChunk> parts)
Deprecated. 
Generate a MessageFormat-style string representing the supplied components, properly quoting any special characters in string literal portions. Note that additional quoting may be required depending on how it will be used, such as backslash-escaping double quotes if it will be used in a generated string constant.

Parameters:
parts - list of TemplateChunks to assemble
Returns:
assembled/quoted string

parse

                                                               throws java.text.ParseException
Deprecated. 
Throws:
java.text.ParseException
